summary: As a Political Sciences student, I have developed a strong understanding of the political landscape, both domestically and internationally. Through my coursework, I have gained valuable analytical and research skills, as well as a deep understanding of policy and governance. Additionally, my experience as a journalist has honed my ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and concisely, as well as my ability to conduct interviews, research, and fact-checking.

experience.title: Journalist
content: Writing for the oldest student magazine in Serbia in a great and dynamic environment.
Researching and reporting on wide range of topics related to student life, student organizations, and academic programs.
Writing articles on various topics, I have honed my writing skills and have become adept at creating engaging and informative articles that resonate with our readers.
Learned to work effectively in a team environment to ensure that our publication is produced on schedule and to a high standard of quality.

experience.title: Journalist
content: Local annual magazine composed of young people, based around problems regarding youth in our local community.
Developed strong communication and interpersonal skills and have learned to navigate conflicts and build consensus in a collaborative work environment.

Learned the importance of multitasking and effective time management. Became skilled at juggling multiple deadlines and priorities and have learned to adapt quickly to changes in our editorial calendar.

experienceeee.title: Journalist
content: Writing for the oldest student magazine in Serbia in a great and dynamic environment.

Researching and reporting on wide range of topics related to student life, student organizations, and academic programs. I have developed strong research skills and the ability to synthesize complex information into clear and concise articles.
Through writing multiple articles on various topics I have honed my writing skills and have become adept at crafting engaging and informative articles that resonate with our readers.

As a member of the editorial team, I have learned to work effectively in a team environment to ensure that our publication is produced on schedule and to a high standard of quality. I have developed strong communication and interpersonal skills, and have learned to navigate conflicts and build consensus in a collaborative work environment.

Multitasking and time management: Working for a student magazine has taught me the importance of multitasking and effective time management. I have become skilled at juggling multiple deadlines and priorities, and have learned to adapt quickly to changes in our editorial calendar.

experienceeee.title: Journalist
content: Local annual magazine composed of young people, based around problems regarding youth in our local community.

education.title: Student
education.company: Faculty of Political Sciences, University of Belgrade · Belgrade, Serbia
